description:
Sonobe has wound up dead! Now Ayumu and Hiyono are determined to dig up some dirt on this crime. While searching for the killer they meet the ever cocky Kousuke. There`s more to this guy than Ayumu knows: Kousuke is a Blade Child! And if things didn`t seem weirder he also knows Kiyotaka!!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: The Happiness of Those Who Believe
